meeting_annotations.transcript: The um paper in 2011, the first author is Dr. Forsight uh shows that in patient with Parkinson disease naive, no constipation or no medication have disruption of intestinal barrier. For it can be all over in the colon and you can measure it and you look at the urine and higher the um levels in the urine leakier the intestine is.
